Blog.post: Stuff2do wasnt gone... but the host server was having ram problems... aanyways... i started a little company last night :D!!! It's called dude productions... i make animated gif logos for peoples website...

dude today i went to the overlord forums and the boards werent working again... but it wasn't the same as before... its not only me this time its more... someone must've deleted them... along with the profiles and Private Messenger becuz those aren't working either... maybe ill put the boards up on mine again...
Well i put up my Dragonspires fan page today... urlLink http://www.angelfire.com/hero/ecco ... after you're there click on dragonspires and try out some of the links... all the links work...
I finally finished reading every comic on squidi.net ... That's more than 500!!!!!!!!!!!! Took me forever but it was well worth it... it was supa awsim and am looking forward to many more to come!!!
I found an awesome webcomic today... its at squidi.net ... and of course there is escapeman.keenspace.net
nvm... all those boards are still up... so i guess i will take down the ones i put up on my forums (most of them) i was just banned from a few boards but Mo unbanned me so it's fine now

WTF!!! The Doompuppet Forums ( urlLink http://stuff2do.systs.net/ ) were taken down today... well not all of them but 4 of the boards were... So i decided to put up all those old boards on my 4ums ( urlLink http://laffs.proboards30.com ) Anyone who cares and stumbles upon this blog go there now... We need more ppl for the 4ums to get bigger!!!
Bleh angelfire sux... but i can't change my site... takes to long... i need to find a site that hosts images and just use that...

I have some things i thought of today... 2 lefts don't make a right, and 2 wrongs don't make a right. But 3 lefts make a right. So does that mean that 3 wrongs make a right? Of Course :D!!! and Why do we seal the grape bag if there are holes in it anyways?

You know what... no one will ever come to this blog unless they stumble on it by accident... but i guess i will post here anyways... I will blog and blog and blog until i can't blog anymore... http://www.angelfire.com/hero/ecco
hello. i am crazy. hello. hello. helllo. you are crazy. hello. go visit my webpage. urlLink http://www.angelfire.com/hero/ecco
